plot: In the fall of 2009, Lindsay Ellis, a 25 year old graduate student, made the decision to terminate her first and only pregnancy, finding the decision much more difficult than she anticipated.
title: The A-Word
plot_es: In the fall of 2009, Lindsay Ellis, a 25 year old graduate student, made the decision to terminate her first and only pregnancy, finding the decision much more difficult than she anticipated.
plot_en: In the fall of 2009, Lindsay Ellis, a 25 year old graduate student, made the decision to terminate her first and only pregnancy, finding the decision much more difficult than she anticipated.
